posts.title: About Me
posts.text: Iâ€™m a PhD student in Computer Science at Case Western Reserve University. My research primarily focuses on the software engineering, machine learning, system and blockchain security. Working Experience Software Engineer Intern, Google, 05/2022 - 08/2022 Research Intern, Palo Alto Networks, 05/2019 - 08/2019 Yelp Software Engineering Intern, 05/2018 - 08/2018 Pulications Graph Summarization on System Audit Logs for Attack Investigation [IEEE Security & Privacy 2022 Accepted] Back-Propagating System Dependency Impact for Attack Investigation [USENIX Security 2022 Accepted] iSyn: Semi-automated Smart Contract Synthesis from Legal Financial Agreements [ISSTA 2023 Accepted] ContractFix: A Framework for Automatically Fixing Vulnerabilities in Smart Contracts [Under revision]

Enable Slurmdbd for SlurmIn recent days, we enable the slurmdbd for slurm running in our cluster. This post records some issues that I have to solve.Hope it will help other people having the same requirements
